title: Watch live
cleaned_text: Home On the show Contests Celebrations Traffic Weather Close Home On the show Contests Celebrations Traffic Weather Watch live Monday to Friday In Case You Missed It WATCH: Devo chats with Cardi B about her new single 'Bongos' 03:09 Top Stories On the show 06:17 "The ugly environment starts with Fallon": Jimmy Fallon faces backlash 06:31 How the YMCA is creating the ultimate outdoor experience for families 01:45 TIFF 2023 is celebrating the many faces behind the scenes 04:14 This GTA festival is designed with car lovers in mind Celebrate with BT Submit a celebration BT Bright Spot 05:06 "No more meows!": Football coach says his team needs to be tougher 02:47 Man falls into his compost bin — and his wife's reaction is priceless 02:42 WATCH: 100 year-old grandmother drinks out of the Stanley Cup 02:37 This dog's happy reunion will make you so emotional 01:24 This 104 year old just threw the first pitch at a Chicago Cubs game 02:21 Postal worker rescues a kitten AND wins the lottery on the same day 02:56 This woman's scream going down a slide is EPIC 03:52 Meet an 84-year-old woman who has gone skydiving over 600 times Meet Meredith Shaw 04:32 Get to know our new cohost, Meredith Shaw 01:52 "It changed my whole life": The best advice Meredith has ever been given 01:19 We put Meredith through the ultimate rapid fire question round 02:37 Meredith reveals her biggest broadcast bloopers Connect with @breakfasttelevision live, weekday mornings Subscribe or follow to watch live weekday mornings on Citytv, YouTube and Facebook.
